properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 7:42PM CST until January 17 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in
Illinois...

Big Muddy River near Plumfield and Murphysboro

.The Big Muddy River has begun cresting at 29.9 feet, after which it
will slowly fall. Plumfield is falling and is forecast to go below
flood stage on Friday afternoon.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Big Muddy River near Plumfield.
* until Friday evening.
* At  7:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 21.5 feet.
* Flood Stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
Friday afternoon.
* Impact...At 20.0 Feet...Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly
bottomland and surrounding low lying areas.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
